Reviews.Title: samsung SA GT5830
Reviews.Author: sampo
Reviews.Content: I ORDERD 2 UNITS OF THIS PHONE WHILE IN USA BECAUSE IT SPECIFICALLY SAID `INTERNATIONAL VERSION` HOWEVER WHEN I BROUGHT THESE PHONES TO SRI LANKA IT DID NOT WORK ON 3G.THE PHONES WHAT I GOT WAS MARKED AS GT5830M AND BANDWITH 2100 WHICH IS USED IN SRI LANKA WAS NOT AVAILABLE.I WANTED TO RETURN BOTH PHONES FROM SRI LANKA AND SELLER REFUSED TO TAKE ONE PHONE WITHOUT THE BOX AS I HAVE LEFT IT IN USA.I WAS INFORMED THAT ONLY A REFUND FOR THE PHONE WITH THE BOX IS APPROVED.THIS SITUATION WAS CREATED DUE TO INCORRECT PRODUCT INFORMATION WHICH IT SAID `INTERNATIONAL VERSION`.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android
Touchscreen
Wi-Fi
5MP Camera
Stereo FM Radio with RDS
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SA-GT5830 Unlocked Cellphone - International Version - Onyx Black
